Name: Zoning, 2226 Third Avenue, Manhattan (N 230345 ZRM)
Title: Application number N 230345 ZRM (2226 Third Avenue) submitted by REEC Third Ave., LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying regulations for floor area and loading in Article XIII, Chapter 8 (Special East Harlem Corridors District) and modifying APPENDIX F (Inclusionary Housing Designated Areas and Mandatory Inclusionary Housing Areas) for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 11, Council District 8.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
